name: The Great Puppini
description:
The game round starts with 90 seconds, not 30 seconds!

Help The Great Puppini make the citizens happy by retrieving its valuables and handing it over to them!

Use the W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

E to interact / Bark

Hold Left Shift to Sprint

Control the camera with your mouse.

Find citizens who require assistance (they will be standing still and they will be shown on the minimap as frowning faces), interact with them, and retrieve their items! Avoid Hot Dog carts while you're at it or the Great Puppini would want to take a bite!

Main Credits:

Hani Zaatar - Main Character Movement, Main Character Interactions,  Audio and SFX.

Elise Vidal - Navigation System (Minimap + Direction Arrow), UI HUD

Idan Dvir (idan8426 - itch.io) - Level and Traffic Design, Traffic System, Dog Rig + Animation, UI Menus

Asset Credits:
